 2003-17192003-11-04,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of CLAUDETTE ROY of Edmonton, Alberta, as Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
